itunes:title: Christian James Hand
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary: Christian James Hand will make you appreciate music like never before. He's the host of the KLOS radio show -and live show- "The Session" where he breaks apart a famous song into each element (guitar, bass, effects, drums), helping us appreciate the work that goes into creating great music. Give the show a listen at https://soundcloud.com/theklossessions and find a live show at https://thesessiononair.com/
itunes:subtitle: Christian James Hand will make you appreciate music like never before. He's the host of the KLOS radio show -and live show- "The Session" where he breaks apart a famous song into each element (guitar, bass, effects, drums), helping us appreciate the work that goes into creating great music. Give the show a listen at https://soundcloud.com/theklossessions and find a live show at https://thesessiononair.com/
